alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 5:36PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clackamas and southeastern Marion Counties through 615 PM PDT... At 536 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Breitenbush Springs, or 17 miles east of Detroit, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Breitenbush Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
